summary: Provides reusable test utilities for PyTorch pipelines that operate on latent representations, verifying that the pipeline behaves consistently across different data formats (tensor, NumPy array, PIL image) and supports multiple VAE components.
business_intent: Enable developers to automatically validate the correctness and format-agnostic behavior of machine-learning pipelines that generate or consume latent variables, reducing regression risk and ensuring compatibility with various input/output types.
